summary: TRANSMISSION WENT OUT COMPLETELY.  WORST EXPERIENCE EVER.  IT GAVE OUT WHILE I WAS ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL, SO I NEVER MADE IT.  SCHOOL WAS ONLY 3 MILES AWAY TOO.  THOUGH I WAS AWARE OF THE IMMINENT FAILURE THANKS TO FELLOW OWNERS, IT WAS NONETHELESS FRIGHTENING.  I WAS SHAKING AS I "CRAWLED" TO A SAFE AREA.  IF I WAS ON THE HIGHWAY, THIS FAILURE COULD OF BEEN FATAL!
